long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Immerse yourself in tranquility with Amiya’s serene underwater theme!

🎨 Minimalist Design: Featuring Amiya gracefully lying in crystal-clear blue waters, surrounded by an aura of calm and elegance.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay refreshed and on schedule with a display inspired by the serene beauty of the underwater scene.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate your favorite websites effortlessly, just like Amiya’s composed demeanor.
🎮 Play Games: Dive into immersive mini-games inspired by Amiya’s world and her captivating adventures.
🔍 Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches, designed to complement the soothing aesthetic.
🚀 More Extensions: Enhance your browsing with features as graceful and refined as Amiya herself.
